comment.comment: Thanks! I've been busy, but I'll start reading and posting things on this page more often. I'm a high school math teacher in Hammond, IN. I started writing children's stories a couple years ago, when I was subbing in elementary schools. Since then I've written a number of rhyming picture book stories. I'm always looking to get feedback on them, and to read what sorts of things other people are writing for children.
comment.author: Andy Kuck

activity_log_data.title: Andy Kuck commented on Melissa Durbin's post.

data.post:
Hey everyone!!! It's me Big Kuck!!! Just wanted to let everyone know I'm on Facebook now. Still getting used to everything but enjoying this social networking thing so far. I also wanted to use this time to tell all of you some very important news. As of May 18, 2014 at 5:50 EST, I have officially become an full-fledged ARSENAL fan!! #Peace, #Love, 
#Jesus, #Arsenal!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

activity_log_data.title: Andy Kuck posted in UCO Grand Rapids.
Andy Kuck commented on John Golden's post.
